experience.description: Conducted longitudinal research on stochastic mortality modeling, utilizing R to simulate life expectancy trends for pension fund risk assessment. Analyzed large-scale demographic datasets to refine predictive accuracy in life insurance pricing models.

Developed a multivariate regression model to assess the correlation between climate change indicators and property insurance claim frequency. Presented findings on tail-risk behavior in catastrophe modeling to faculty advisors.

Synthesized peer-reviewed research on Credibility Theory to build a prototype credibility-weighted premium calculator. Evaluated the impact of various smoothing techniques on loss development factors.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
